channel.title: Nividia | Soulsplit | Remake
channel.description:
[center][i][font=trebuchet ms][size=24pt]Nividia Online[/size][/font][/i] Nividia is a project that I've been working all year on. It took a lot of time coding it, and adding many new things that I've finally accomplished. It's unlike any other server out there today. It's got a nice economy, great pking, and no lagg. Which in my opinion is a must to have a successful server. It is currently me working on it, I've done so much to make it compatible with the new client by adding the correct animations, gfx, items, etc. We've received 20 players with in 2 hours running it, it is currently offline due to maintenance. Here are some pictures that may interest you.[/center] [center]Vote! [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/2wgx3m1.jpg[/img] Nividia's new home [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/egehso.jpg[/img] Stalls! [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/11tbrc9.jpg[/img] Skilling! [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/qyxunk.jpg[/img] Sir Tiffy [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/2hcmigw.jpg[/img] Town Crier [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/2qi78sw.jpg[/img] Combat [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/29vgd53.png[/img] [img]http://alessandroricciardi.com/images/ri/dclaws.gif[/img][img]http://alessandroricciardi.com/images/ri/dds.gif[/img][img]http://alessandroricciardi.com/images/ri/ags.gif[/img][img]http://alessandroricciardi.com/images/ri/ovl.gif[/img] Curse prayers! [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2i88acy.png[/img] Dungeoneering [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/2u6juza.jpg[/img] New 602 npcs! [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/nbtbfk.png[/img] New 634 items [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/263k2yr.png[/img] Godwars dungeon [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/33w8o3q.png[/img] New fully animated Tztok-Jad [IMG]http://oi55.tinypic.com/24y4uq9.jpg[/img] Warriors Guild [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/241qru0.png[/img] New 602 gfx and emotes! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Qyk1C.png[/img] Corporeal beast and tormented demons [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/smcysn.png[/img] DFS spec [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/kcfkgl.png[/img] Duel arena [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/24q78df.png[/img] Barrows [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/289jyv8.png[/img] Pest control [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/iyif7n.png[/img] Teleports [img]http://oi56.tinypic.com/1z23sps.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][b]Latest Updates below, 75 great features!:[/b] Player owned shops! 634 items added 602 gfx added 602 emotes added 602 npcs Ancient curses rewritten, with near perfect formulas! All items now wieldable and have the right requirements Godwars dungeon added with all minions and boss drops New home - Keldagrim Moved Farming to Lunar Ilse Move Woodcutting to Lunar Ilse aswell Added Inferno Adze Fixed the godsword spec anims Fixed all bugs Fixed all dupes Changed Exp rate from 300 to 800 + the server bonus, fairly good exp rate Cut down on some of the cache memory Autocache downloads now Added an Npc to sell barrows gloves for 20m - currently only way to get them (removed from pest control) Added a new starter that gives 50 to any combat stat you wish Added a casket system, Caskets drop from bosses such as corp, godwars and torm demons - they can give you shit, or a rare item ;) Perfect switching, good for hybriding Ability to Rush Redid some drops and drop rates [b][u]Autocasting redone[/u][/b] Added new gfx and emote to teleports Warriors guild Chaotics & Korasi Fixed glowing in the mage book Fullscreen + Resizable Robgobs new alert system 600+ revision gameframe New skys Corporeal beast Added zgs to weapon shop for 100m Added an npc to teleport to 5 different citys: Draynor Falador Al Karid Canifis Varrock New donator shop with dragons Brimhaven agility course added Fishing moved to fishing guild PvP drops An NPC to reset stats Tormented demons Skillcape emotes DFS special Spirit shield effects Staff of light New banking interface New login box Background switching Remember me feature Barrows Pest Control Tzhaar fight pits Duel Arena Great slayer skill and Slayer Tower Brimhaven dungeon Taverly dungeon Ancients Xp counter adjustable zoom[/center] Credits: Asshole_rule (Client)
Application Format: [b]Server Sided Programmer[/b] [code] Name: Gender: Age: *Years Of Experience: *Previous Work: Strengths: Weaknesses: Contact Information: How Active Will you be: [/code] [b]Client Sided Programmer[/b] [code] Name: Gender: Age: *Years Of Experience: *Previous Work: Strengths: Weaknesses: Contact Information: How Active Will you be: [/code] [b]Media Artist[/b] [code] Name: Gender: Age: *Years Of Experience: *Previous Work: Strengths: Weaknesses: Contact Information: How Active Will you be: [/code] [b]Webmaster[/b] [code] Name: Gender: Age: *Years Of Experience: *Previous Work: Strengths: Weaknesses: Contact Information: How Active Will you be: [/code] [b]Moderator[/b] [code] Name: Gender: Age: Why should I consider you (Apply effort into this question): How active are you: Timezone: [/code]

Strengths: Forums are my expertise, whether it be vB, MyBB, IPB, SMF, phpBB, it just depends on what you’d like.
Weaknesses: None that I can really think of.
Contact Information: MSN: alex.amayzing@hotmail.com
How Active Will you be: Extremely active and dedicated given the other team members are as well.

Webmaster

Name: Nathan
Gender: Male
Age: 17
*Years Of Experience: 2 to 3
*Previous Work: http://definitive-x.tk/ (No activity because the server hasn’t started yet. I chose to leave that team.
Strengths: I love Player Support and assisting with anything I can.
Weaknesses: HTML coding and webhost/domain linking.
Contact Information: natewentworth@hotmail.com
How Active Will you be: Everyday I can get on, I will. 6+ hours per day during vacations and summer. 2+ during the school year.

item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

Name: Nolan
Gender: Male
Age: 16
Why should I consider you (Apply effort into this question): I have had many years of experience in every aspect of RSPS’s. I know what it takes to become and maintain a server helper position. I realize that it is not about me or the crown, but how I can contribute my time and talents in to helping and making the server the best it can be. I respect those who respect me, that includes players and fellow staff members alike. I would never abuse, and I would accept consequence if I have done wrong.
How active are you: 3-4 hours 2hrs when school starts.
Timezone: Eastern
